Crime rates would increase as people would be more likely to act on impulse without any sense of consequence.
Governments and institutions would struggle to maintain order and provide basic services such as healthcare and education.
Relationships would be severely strained as people would not recognize their loved ones or have any shared history.
The economy would likely collapse as people would be unable to work or engage in commerce.
The environment could be negatively impacted as people would be unable to remember how to take care of it.
